setting.name: Use Auto-compare Feature
setting.description: When set to True, this will allow a compare to be done on a component.

setting.name: Working File Character Encoding
setting.description: Character encoding for working files. The default encoding is utf8 (UTF-8).

setting.name: Source File Character Encoding
setting.description: Character encoding for source files. Change this to the correct encoding of the source files if encoding conversion is needed. Internal default file encoding is UTF-8 for all working text.

setting.name: Unicode Normal Form
setting.description: The Unicode normalization form. Two are supported, NFD (Normal Form Decomposed) and NFC (Normal Form Composed). NFD is the default.
